## Response

* Headers :

```yaml
# key - value map of in yaml format
```


* Successful Response:

```json
{
  "success": true,
  "body": {
    // put reply fields here
  }
}
```

* Unsuccessful Response

```json
{
  "success": false,
  "body": {
    // put reply fields here
  }
}
```
